BNC User Reference Guide

<stext>

stext contains a single spoken text, i.e. a transcription or collection of transcriptions from a single source.
Declaration 
element stext
{
   attribute type { "CONVRSN" | "OTHERSP" },
   ( model.divPart.spoken*, div* )
}
Attributes
(In addition to global attributes)
type specifies the type of spoken text.
Status: Required
Legal values are:
CONVRSN demographically sampled conversation.
OTHERSP any other spoken text.
Module module-from-bncxml
